title: Introduction
body: You are going to learn more about how can you deal with back door selling. Play the introduction video so you can have a better overview over what is coming up next. The training is brought to you by: Benedict Negotiating Seminars, Inc
instruction:
After completing the video you are going to be prompted with a Begin button to go to the 1st scene.

This is a license for the training of 1 person only. Violations should be reported to BNS at 813-655-4272 or local FBI office.
